intro: Luna and Canela embark on a magical adventure to recover a lost necklace and discover that together they are invincible as sisters!
description:
Luna, a tidy kitten, and Canela, a super-cheerful dog, stumble into a magical garden after losing a very special collar.

There, they must overcome fun challenges, change personalities, and solve riddles with the help of enchanting creatures.

Amid laughter, magic, and silliness, they discover that being sisters is their superpower and that family love always grows stronger.
